author: flo (tonebytone)
content:
OOPS!!! I swear that I bought this camera with the understanding, misunderstanding as it turns out, that it had a form of vibration reduction! Well, I've carefully searched through all the menus and finally the manual - and if I'd read the manual from cover to cover, I'd have discovered the meaning of that yellow camera icon with the shake lines - it is supposed to mean that the shutter speed is low enough that blur may occur!

So why is my little yellow camera icon on all the time? Must be a bug, then!

Andreas, thanks so much for pointing this out to me, lol, and you don't even own one!

Hugs,
Red-faced Flo
